languages.text: "Я прикончил многих ксеносов и попировал их плотью. Мои пленители веселились, глядя на это, а я собирал информацию и готовил побег".
"I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."
languages.original_text: "Я прикончил многих ксеносов и попировал их плотью. Мои пленители веселились, глядя на это, а я собирал информацию и готовил побег".

traits.locale_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我已经杀过了很多异形，饱餐他们的血肉。俘虏我的那个人觉得我大啖血肉的场面很有意思，而我却一直在收集情报，策划着我的逃亡。”
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: “我已经杀过了很多异形，饱餐他们的血肉。俘虏我的那个人觉得我大啖血肉的场面很有意思，而我却一直在收集情报，策划着我的逃亡。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «He matado a muchos xenos y me he dado un festín con su carne. Mis captores me han observado hacerlo, regocijándose, mientras yo recababa información y planeaba mi huida».
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: «He matado a muchos xenos y me he dado un festín con su carne. Mis captores me han observado hacerlo, regocijándose, mientras yo recababa información y planeaba mi huida».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は多くの異種族を殺し、その肉を食べてきた。俺を捕らえた連中は、俺が情報収集と逃亡計画を練っている間、それを見て悦に入っていた」
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は多くの異種族を殺し、その肉を食べてきた。俺を捕らえた連中は、俺が情報収集と逃亡計画を練っている間、それを見て悦に入っていた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe viele Xenos getötet und mich an ihrem Fleisch gelabt. Meine Peiniger haben mir zugesehen, haben sich darüber amüsiert, während ich Informationen gesammelt und meine Flucht geplant habe."
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe viele Xenos getötet und mich an ihrem Fleisch gelabt. Meine Peiniger haben mir zugesehen, haben sich darüber amüsiert, während ich Informationen gesammelt und meine Flucht geplant habe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vaincu maints xénos et dévoré leur chair. Mes geôliers m'ont regardé faire et ont profité du spectacle, tandis que je rassemblais des informations et planifiais mon évasion. »
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vaincu maints xénos et dévoré leur chair. Mes geôliers m'ont regardé faire et ont profité du spectacle, tandis que je rassemblais des informations et planifiais mon évasion. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."

languages.text: "Birçok zenoyu öldürdüm ve etleriyle ziyafet çektim. Beni tutsak edenler de öylece izleyip keyiflendi. Hâlbuki ben bilgi topluyor ve kaçışımı planlıyordum."
languages.original_text: "I have slain many xenos and feasted on their flesh. My captors have watched me do it, and taken glee in it, while I have been gathering information and planning my escape."
